name: Three Treason Theories RPG
description:
This is a pretty special RPG indie game that all rpg-lovels would surely like, because all things that are present in rpg games are in this game, in the form of a reference or tribute.

In this game you will embody a student, from a particular subject, you will be a student of Rpgs.
In the course of your adventure in this game, you will have to face challenges, in the form of battle or other forms, in the small scenario in which you will initially appear.
You will have to win everyone and overcome all the difficulties to conventirte in an expert!

In your learning process you will have to assimilate ideas and concepts of the battles of the RPG, such as functional damage, physical battles, abilities and how to unblock them.
So if you want to have a good time, do not hesitate to play "Three Treason Theories" to become an expert in rpgs.

What to expect:

-Special gameplay.

-Interesting plot.

-Retro rpg style

-Good and challenging battles.

How to play:

-Arrow keys to move

-Space to interact.
